title: 07/13/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 07/13/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's Home Run Derby. Did Dan tune out once Ohtani was eliminated? Color Analyst for tonight's All Star game John Smoltz joins the show to explain why what Shohei Ohtani is doing is so special. And The Athletic's Joe Vardon calls in to discuss the exchange he had with Gregg Popovich after last night's Team USA loss to Australia.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Color Analyst for tonight's All Star game John Smoltz joins the show to explain why what Shohei Ohtani is doing is so special. And The Athletic's Joe Vardon calls in to discuss the exchange he had with Gregg Popovich after last night's Team USA loss to Australia.
